name: Fickle Beam
description: You shoot a beam of light to inflict damage. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE dragon damage. This move scores a critical hit on an attack roll of natural 17 or higher.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
